column4: Hey, how do I find out what libraries I need to install a program? I'm getting errors when I run 'make'. :)

first install build essential ,   sudo apt-get install build-essential ,  then open a terminal , cd to the folder with your source in it and run  ./configure  that will tell you if you have everytihng you need to install
I was suggested build-essential, I did that and have the most recent files. And there is NO configure file :S
